Text: This game has an update on it and I applied it to my xbox and it froze half way through. Warning anyone that can help me fix let me know please. Every time I turn it on it tries to read update :( Cant do anything anymore....
You have to put the xbox back to original and then reflash it again , you shouldnt have updated butnyou will be fine
doesnt work for me either when applying update. anyone know a way of reflashing my xbox with the original key only please let us know.
@NazstyNazG u have to use the latest jungleflasher v0.1.86 and then u spoof the original key to the latest fw LTPlus-025v1.91

This has SSv1 not SSv2, and there isn't an SSv2  patch around for it yet. Also, this shows up as unverified in ABGX, but that's because ABGX doesn't have this game in their database yet. So, I'm not burning this until these issues are resolved.
